title: New: P A T H – D R I P
body:
Wow.

Well this is the first piece of truly next level music I’ve heard this year, and it comes courtesy of 15 year old beatmaker P A T H. An undoubtedly unique track, there’s elements of SOPHIE’s BIPP in the choppy nature of the beat and daringly simplistic composition. Fly-lo would be proud of this one. Stream D R I P below.

An undoubtedly unique track, there’s elements of SOPHIE’s BIPP in the choppy nature of the beat and daringly simplistic composition. Fly-lo would be proud of this \[…\]
